      • combine

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String combine(java.lang.String separator,
                                                    java.lang.String... parts)
        Deprecated. 
        Use join(String, String...) instead (is more properly named). Method is not likely to be removed, however.

      • combine

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String combine(java.lang.String separator,
                                                    java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> parts)
        Deprecated. 
        Use join(String, Collection) instead (is more properly named) Method is not likely to be removed, however.
